overview.en: ISC发行量20亿个，系统定价0.1USTD/个，每销毁10万个，价格上涨0.01，以每天为一个单位进行计算上涨，低于十万，价格不变，销毁累计到第二天；超过10万，按数值/10万的比例*0.01进行上涨。
overview.zh: ISC issuance is 2 billion, the system price is 0.1 USTD/unit, every 100,000 destroyed, the price rises 0.01, calculated as a unit every day, under 100,000, the price remains unchanged, the destruction accumulated to the next day; more than 100,000, according to the ratio of value to 100,000 * 0.01.
